extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

        public Board()
        Constructor of the Board class.
        pre:
        post: A new Board object has been created. sets the game status to false (not over yet) and creates the first square.

        resets the attributes of the Board object to its default status.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the attributes of the board have been set to its default status.

      • getWinnerInfo

        public java.lang.String getWinnerInfo()
        returns the information of the winner that won the current game in a String.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the symbol and total of movements of the player tha won the game.

      • setGameStatus

        public void setGameStatus(boolean gameStatus)
        changes the current game status.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the status of the game has been changed. true if its over, false if not.
        Parameters:
        gameStatus - the new status of the current game that is being played.

      • getGameStatus

        public boolean getGameStatus()
        returns the status of the current game.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the status of the game. True if its over (A player has won), false if not.

      • receiveGameParameters

        public void receiveGameParameters(int rows,
                                  int columns,
                                  int snakes,
                                  int ladders,
                                  java.lang.String symbols)
        receives the parameters of the current game and calls the methods that create the board, generate the snakes and ladders and adds the players.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null. Parameters are initialized.
        post: a new board has been created and its ready to be used for the game.
        Parameters:
        rows - the amount of rows of the board to be created. rows greater than 0.
        columns - the amount of columns of the board to be created. columns greater than 0.
        snakes - the amount of snakes to place in the board.
        ladders - the amount of ladders to place in the board.
        symbols - the symbols of the players that are going ot play.

      • receiveGameParameters

        public void receiveGameParameters(int rows,
                                  int columns,
                                  int snakes,
                                  int ladders,
                                  int amountPlayers)
        receives the parameters of the current game and calls the methods that create the board, generate the snakes and ladders and adds the players.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null. the parameters are initialized.
        post: a new board has been created and it's ready to be used for the game.
        Parameters:
        rows - the amount of rows of the board to be created. rows greater than 0
        columns - the amount of columns of the board to be created. columns greater than 0
        snakes - the amount of snakes to place in the board.
        ladders - the amount of ladders to place in the board.
        amountPlayers - the amount of players to place in the board.

      • throwDice

        public java.lang.String throwDice()
        throws a dice of six faces and moves the current player a number of squares given by the value of the dice.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the current player has moved the given value by the dice. returns the information corresponding to the throw.

      • createBoard

        public void createBoard(int row,
                        int col)
        creates a new board. A linked list of Square objects
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: a new linked list of squares hat represents the board has been created.
        Parameters:
        row - the amount of rows of the new board. row greater than 0
        col - the amount of columns of the new board. col greater than 0

      • addAllPlayers

        public void addAllPlayers(java.lang.String symbols,
                          int index)
        calls the method that adds a specific player given its symbol.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: all the players have been added.
        Parameters:
        symbols - all the symbols of the players to be added in a String.
        index - an auxiliar used to stop the recursive call to the method. index greater or equal to 0

        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: a new player has been added.

        symbol - the symbol of the player to add.

      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(java.lang.String symbol,
                          int steps)
        moves a player given its symbol a certain amount of steps.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the player has been moved in the board.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol of the player to be moved. the symbol is currently being used by a player
        steps - the amount of steps to move the player. steps greater than 0

      • getPlayers

        returns the circular linked list of players.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the circular linked list of players.

      • searchPlayer

        public Player searchPlayer(java.lang.String symbol,
                           Player current)
        searches a player in the linked list of players given its symbol.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the Player with the given symbol.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol of the player to search.
        current - the current player of the linked list. current != null.

      • generateSnakesAndLadders

        public void generateSnakesAndLadders(int snakesAmount,
                                     int laddersAmount)
        calls the method the method that generates the snakes and ladders passing as parameters the initial values.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the snakes and ladders have been successfully added to the board.
        Parameters:
        snakesAmount - the amount of snakes to place in the board. snakeAmount greater than 0
        laddersAmount - the amount of ladders to place in the board. laddersAmount greater than 0

      • generateSnakes

        public void generateSnakes(int snakesAmount,
                           char symbol)
        generates the head and tail of a snake in a random square with the given symbol. the tail and the head will be linked.
        pre: the snakes and ladders have been successfully added to the board. post: the snakes have been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        snakesAmount - the amount of snakes to add. snakesAmount greater or equal to 0
        symbol - the symbol to use for the head and tail.

      • reLocatedHead

        public Square reLocatedHead(Square head,
                            char symbol)
        relocates a snake in case there is no space to place it in the board.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the head has been relocated.
        Parameters:
        head - the square to be relocated.
        symbol - the symbol to use for the new snake.

      • reLocatedTop

        public Square reLocatedTop(Square head,
                           int symbol)
        relocates a ladder in case there is no space to place it in the board.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the top has been relocated.
        Parameters:
        head - the square to be relocated.
        symbol - the symbol to use for the new ladder.

      • setSnakeHead

        public Square setSnakeHead(Square current,
                           char symbol,
                           int goal)
        sets the head of a snake in a square.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the head of the snake has been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        current - the current square being used in the linked list
        symbol - the symbol to use for the snake to be added.
        goal - the number of the square to place the element.

      • setSnakeTail

        public void setSnakeTail(Square current,
                         char symbol,
                         int goal,
                         Square head)
        sets the tail of a snake in a square of the board.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the tail of the snake has been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        current - the current square being used in the linked list.
        symbol - the symbol to use for the snake that will be added.
        goal - the number of the square to place the element.
        head - the head of the snake that will be linked to the added tail

      • generateLadders

        public void generateLadders(int laddersAmount,
                            int symbol)
        calls the methods tha generates both the head an bottom of a ladder.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the ladders have been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        laddersAmount - the amount of ladders to be added. laddersAmount greater or equal to 0
        symbol - the symbol to be used for the generated ladders.

      • setLadderTop

        public Square setLadderTop(Square current,
                           int symbol,
                           int goal)
        Adds the top of a square in the board. This top will be used by the ladders.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the top ladder has been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        current - the current Square being used in the linked list
        symbol - the symbol to be used by the ladder to add.
        goal - the number of the square to place the element.

      • setLadderBot

        public void setLadderBot(Square current,
                         int symbol,
                         int goal,
                         Square head)
        Adds the bottom of a square in the board. This bottom is used by the ladders.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the bottom ladder has been successfully added.
        Parameters:
        current - the current square being used in the linked list.
        symbol - the symbol to use for the ladder.
        goal - the number of the square to place the element
        head - the head that is linked to the bottom of the ladder to add.

      • addScore

        public void addScore(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a new score to the search binary tree. if root is null, the score will be added there. Otherwise the method that searches the place of save it will be called.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: a new score has been added to the inverted binary search tree.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the winner player that got the score to be added.

      • getScoresInString

        public java.lang.String getScoresInString()
        returns the saved information of the scores of previous played games.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: the information in a String of the saved Scores.

      • deepClone

        public java.lang.Object deepClone()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        makes a deep clone of the current Board object using serialization.
        pre: the object that calls the method is not null.
        post: returns a new object that is a deep clone of the current Board.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
